Description.SourceString: +7.5% Weapon Damage. Changes damage to Energy, which is only reduced by half vs Elemental enemies. Causes affliction for 6 seconds, dealing damage every second. Cannot be applied more than once every 7 seconds per target.
Description.LocalizedString: +7.5% Weapon Damage. Changes damage to Energy, which is only reduced by half vs Elemental enemies. Causes affliction for 6 seconds, dealing damage every second. Cannot be applied more than once every 7 seconds per target.
